relationships.description: Harry and his group are heading to King's Cross.
The Ministry cars are compared to the Knight Bus.
Harry notices that Uncle Vernon's new company car cannot slide through gaps like the Ministry cars.
Mr. Weasley keeps close to Harry throughout their journey into King's Cross.
